paper.title: An on-line machine learning return prediction
paper.abstract: This paper introduces a novel methodology for predicting relative asset returns usin g a large dataset. Our approach utilizes on-line universal portfolio construction and generates a closed-form prediction formula based solely on historical data. Ou r results demonstrate that the predictive error can be as low as 2% and is robust. These findings suggest that on-line machine learning techniques have the potential to predict relative asset returns when sufficient data is available.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是利用在线机器学习方法预测相对资产回报，并应用于在线通用投资组合构建，这直接关联到投资组合管理领域。
